00009 void    computeContactSphereConvex(int pairIndex,
00010                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
00011                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
00012                                                                                                                                 const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
00013                                                                                                                                 const b3Collidable* collidables,
00014                                                                                                                                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes,
00015                                                                                                                                 const b3Vector3* convexVertices,
00016                                                                                                                                 const int* convexIndices,
00017                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuFace* faces,
00018                                                                                                                                 b3Contact4* globalContactsOut,
00019                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
00020                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity)
00021 {
00022 
00023         float radius = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_radius;
00024         float4 spherePos1 = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
00025         b3Quaternion sphereOrn = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029         float4 pos = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
00030         
00031 
00032         b3Quaternion quat = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
00033 
00034         b3Transform tr;
00035         tr.setIdentity();
00036         tr.setOrigin(pos);
00037         tr.setRotation(quat);
00038         b3Transform trInv = tr.inverse();
00039 
00040         float4 spherePos = trInv(spherePos1);
00041 
00042         int collidableIndex = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;
00043         int shapeIndex = collidables[collidableIndex].m_shapeIndex;
00044         int numFaces = convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_numFaces;
00045         float4 closestPnt = b3MakeVector3(0, 0, 0, 0);
00046         float4 hitNormalWorld = b3MakeVector3(0, 0, 0, 0);
00047         float minDist = -1000000.f; // TODO: What is the largest/smallest float?
00048         bool bCollide = true;
00049         int region = -1;
00050         float4 localHitNormal;
00051         for ( int f = 0; f < numFaces; f++ )
00052         {
00053                 b3GpuFace face = faces[convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_faceOffset+f];
00054                 float4 planeEqn;
00055                 float4 localPlaneNormal = b3MakeVector3(face.m_plane.x,face.m_plane.y,face.m_plane.z,0.f);
00056                 float4 n1 = localPlaneNormal;//quatRotate(quat,localPlaneNormal);
00057                 planeEqn = n1;
00058                 planeEqn[3] = face.m_plane.w;
00059 
00060                 float4 pntReturn;
00061                 float dist = signedDistanceFromPointToPlane(spherePos, planeEqn, &pntReturn);
00062 
00063                 if ( dist > radius)
00064                 {
00065                         bCollide = false;
00066                         break;
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 if ( dist > 0 )
00070                 {
00071                         //might hit an edge or vertex
00072                         b3Vector3 out;
00073 
00074                         bool isInPoly = IsPointInPolygon(spherePos,
00075                                         &face,
00076                                         &convexVertices[convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_vertexOffset],
00077                                         convexIndices,
00078                     &out);
00079                         if (isInPoly)
00080                         {
00081                                 if (dist>minDist)
00082                                 {
00083                                         minDist = dist;
00084                                         closestPnt = pntReturn;
00085                                         localHitNormal = planeEqn;
00086                                         region=1;
00087                                 }
00088                         } else
00089                         {
00090                                 b3Vector3 tmp = spherePos-out;
00091                                 b3Scalar l2 = tmp.length2();
00092                                 if (l2<radius*radius)
00093                                 {
00094                                         dist  = b3Sqrt(l2);
00095                                         if (dist>minDist)
00096                                         {
00097                                                 minDist = dist;
00098                                                 closestPnt = out;
00099                                                 localHitNormal = tmp/dist;
00100                                                 region=2;
00101                                         }
00102                                         
00103                                 } else
00104                                 {
00105                                         bCollide = false;
00106                                         break;
00107                                 }
00108                         }
00109                 }
00110                 else
00111                 {
00112                         if ( dist > minDist )
00113                         {
00114                                 minDist = dist;
00115                                 closestPnt = pntReturn;
00116                                 localHitNormal = planeEqn;
00117                                 region=3;
00118                         }
00119                 }
00120         }
00121         static int numChecks = 0;
00122         numChecks++;
00123 
00124         if (bCollide && minDist > -10000)
00125         {
00126                 
00127                 float4 normalOnSurfaceB1 = tr.getBasis()*localHitNormal;//-hitNormalWorld;
00128                 float4 pOnB1 = tr(closestPnt);
00129                 //printf("dist ,%f,",minDist);
00130                 float actualDepth = minDist-radius;
00131                 if (actualDepth<0)
00132                 {
00133                 //printf("actualDepth = ,%f,", actualDepth);
00134                 //printf("normalOnSurfaceB1 = ,%f,%f,%f,", normalOnSurfaceB1.x,normalOnSurfaceB1.y,normalOnSurfaceB1.z);
00135                 //printf("region=,%d,\n", region);
00136                 pOnB1[3] = actualDepth;
00137 
00138                 int dstIdx;
00139 //    dstIdx = nGlobalContactsOut++;//AppendInc( nGlobalContactsOut, dstIdx );
00140                 
00141                 if (nGlobalContactsOut < maxContactCapacity)
00142                 {
00143                         dstIdx=nGlobalContactsOut;
00144                         nGlobalContactsOut++;
00145 
00146                         b3Contact4* c = &globalContactsOut[dstIdx];
00147                         c->m_worldNormalOnB = normalOnSurfaceB1;
00148                         c->setFrictionCoeff(0.7);
00149                         c->setRestituitionCoeff(0.f);
00150 
00151                         c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
00152                         c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
00153                         c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
00154                         c->m_worldPosB[0] = pOnB1;
00155                         int numPoints = 1;
00156                         c->m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numPoints;
00157                 }//if (dstIdx < numPairs)
00158                 }
00159         }//if (hasCollision)
00160         
00161 }
